short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Override the standard new tab page with a random image from the Metropolitan Museum of Art's Islamic Art Department

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide and Seek: Details in Islamic Painting 
An image from the online collection of the Metropolitan Museum of Art's Islamic Department will override the standard new tab page.
The chrome extension features more than 100 paper based objects from museum's collection.  Click on a work of art's tittle to learn more about the object!
Developed and designed by Alanood Al-Thani.
